org.metastatic.rsync

Class Configuration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metastatic.rsync.Configuration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Configuration

    public static class Configuration.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder object for a configuration.

    All settable values of this builder are optional except for the strong sum. You must initialize the strong sum property with an appropriate MessageDigest instance.
